mapper.sql: mission_id, mission_no, mission_sys, mission_type, mission_mana, mission_headline, mission_content, mission_step, mission_st, mission_ct, mission_num, mission_money, mission_all, mission_link, mission_verify,mission_pattern
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from mission
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT m.*,u.user_name,u.user_head,mt.mission_type_name,s.sys_name FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id and m.mission_id = #{missionId}
mapper.insert: insert into mission (mission_id, mission_no, mission_sys, mission_type, mission_mana, mission_headline, mission_content, mission_st, mission_ct, mission_num, mission_money, mission_all, mission_pattern,mission_text,mission_link, mission_verify ) values (#{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionSys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionMana,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionSt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{missionCt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{missionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{missionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{missionAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{missionPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missionVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update:
update mission
mission_id = #{record.missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_no = #{record.missionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_sys = #{record.missionSys,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_type = #{record.missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_mana = #{record.missionMana,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_headline = #{record.missionHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_content = #{record.missionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_step = #{record.missionStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_st = #{record.missionSt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mission_ct = #{record.missionCt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mission_num = #{record.missionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_money = #{record.missionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mission_all = #{record.missionAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mission_link = #{record.missionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_verify = #{record.missionVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update mission set mission_id = #{record.missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_no = #{record.missionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_sys = #{record.missionSys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_type = #{record.missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_mana = #{record.missionMana,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_headline = #{record.missionHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_content = #{record.missionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_step = #{record.missionStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_st = #{record.missionSt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mission_ct = #{record.missionCt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mission_num = #{record.missionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_money = #{record.missionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mission_all = #{record.missionAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mission_link = #{record.missionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_verify = #{record.missionVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update mission
mission_no = #{missionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_sys = #{missionSys,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_type = #{missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_mana = #{missionMana,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_headline = #{missionHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_content = #{missionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_step = #{missionStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_st = #{missionSt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mission_ct = #{missionCt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mission_num = #{missionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mission_money = #{missionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mission_all = #{missionAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mission_link = #{missionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mission_verify = #{missionVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mission set mission_no = #{missionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_sys = #{missionSys,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_type = #{missionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_mana = #{missionMana,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_headline = #{missionHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_content = #{missionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_step = #{missionStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_st = #{missionSt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mission_ct = #{missionCt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mission_num = #{missionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_money = #{missionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mission_all = #{missionAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mission_link = #{missionLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mission_verify = #{missionVerify,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num, u.user_name,u.user_ex,mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st, m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify,m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id where mission_headline like CONCAT('%',#{missionHeadline},'%') or mission_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{missionNo},'%') or mission_content like CONCAT('%',#{missionContent},'%')

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_mana,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id and m.mission_type = #{missionType}

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id ORDER BY mission_st DESC

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id where sys_name='苹果'

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id ORDER BY mission_money DESC

select m.mission_type,m.mission_id,m.mission_headline,m.mission_content,m.mission_no,m.mission_step,m.mission_num,u.user_name,u.user_ex, mt.mission_type_name,mt.mission_type_picture,m.mission_money,m.mission_all,m.mission_st,m.mission_ct,s.sys_name,m.mission_verify, m.mission_text FROM mission m INNER JOIN mission_type mt ON m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id INNER JOIN USER u ON m.mission_mana=u.user_id inner join sys s on m.mission_sys = s.sys_id order by user_ex desc
SELECT m.*,mt.* FROM mission m,mission_type mt WHERE m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id order by mission_st desc
SELECT m.*,u.*,mt.* FROM mission m,mission_type mt,USER u WHERE m.mission_type=mt.mission_type_id AND m.mission_mana=u.user_id AND m.mission_id=#{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
